contentrichtext.text: {{Taxobox <!-- Color parameter is not needed -- automatically assigned --> | name = ''Morbillivirus | virus_group = v | ordo = ''[[Mononegavirales]]'' | familia = ''[[Paramyxoviridae]]'' | genus = '''''Morbillivirus''''' | type_species = ''[[Measles virus]]'' | subdivision_ranks = Species | subdivision =[[Canine distemper virus]]<br/> [[Cetacean morbillivirus]]<br/> [[Dolphin morbillivirus]]<br/> [[Feline morbillivirus]]<br/> [[Measles virus]]<br/> [[Peste-des-petits-ruminants virus]]<br/> [[Phocine distemper virus]]<br/> [[Pilot whale morbillivirus]]<br/> [[Porpoise morbillivirus]]<br/> [[Rinderpest virus]] }} '''''Morbillivirus''''' is a genus belonging to the ''[[Paramyxoviridae]]'' family of [[virus]]es in the order ''[[Mononegavirales]]''. Many members of the genus cause [[disease]]s, such as [[rinderpest]] and [[measles]], and are highly infectious. == External links == {{wikispecies}} * [http://www.expasy.org/viralzone/all_by_species/86.html '''ViralZone''': Morbiliviruss] * [http://www.viprbrc.org/brc/home.do?decorator=paramyxo Virus Pathogen Database and Analysis Resource (ViPR): Paramyxoviridae] [[Category:Morbilliviruses]] {{Virus-stub}}
